caption.p: Example showing cloud-based analysis of Nanopore metagenomic sequencing data via NanoSPC. ( A) and ( B) Web interfaces for executing data analysis and real-time monitoring of the progress. ( C) Statistical summary of the data quality. ( D) Taxonomic assignment of sequencing reads, percentage of bacterial and viral reads. ( E) Genome coverage by mapping sequencing reads to reference sequences. ( F) Execution time for each process in the pipeline.
